item.title: The US government may shut down at midnight. Here's what to know
item.description: A potential shutdown of the U.S. government looms at midnight, as President Donald Trump and members of congress work toward a deal to avert it.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump calls on Hamas to accept peace proposal
item.description: The president called on Hamas to accept what he called an "extremely fair" proposal to end the war in Gaza and return the hostages to Israel.
